channel.title: Changing the loading page
channel.description:
Hey Caue,
You helped me awhile back with some coding on my site (boyfriendscloset.net). I was wondering if you would be able to help me with something I'm having trouble figuring out. I was hoping to have a loading page gif with a custom image. Something like what Reformation Clothing ( https://www.thereformation.com ) has with the small triangle as the page loads.
Let me know if you are available and if this would be at all possible, also how much it would cost!
Thanks
Talk soon, Chantal B.
*Chantal Bethune* Founder and Blogger | Boyfriends Closet chantal@boyfriendscloset.net http://www.boyfriendscloset.net

item.title: Changing the loading page
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Hey again Chantal, I'm happy to hear again from you!

Unfortunately, I'm no longer working with web sites or squarespace.

In any case, the only way to make this possible, last time I've checked, would be making it a developer site. Just a small hint for your quest, in case you shall persist.

Read full topic
